subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Flavia Pennetta beat Bethanie Mattek-Sands, 7-6 (4), 6-2, to give Italy, the defending champion, a 2-0 lead over the United States in the Fed Cup final in San Diego.
snippet: Flavia Pennetta beat Bethanie Mattek-Sands, 7-6 (4), 6-2, to give Italy, the defending champion, a 2-0 lead over the United States in the Fed Cup final in San Diego.
